BTW- if you really think a help desk is a techie, and does anything more than type your into a LLM chat bot to regurgitate it to you I’d be happy to

Message 566 of 4024
Thanks for the parenting ultimatum. You did not need to send it again. You have been sharing your ultimatum all afternoon. I’m reasonably
intelligent enough to have recognized that the first time you made the unilateral decision despite the concerns I told you I had and tried to work with
you to reach a reasonable solution. I’d still like to please.
The irony of course is you won’t have the discussion based on your IT expertise that tells you my explanation is wrong. While you needed help to
change the WiFi password, reboot the network, flush the router, connect your laptop and phone (you did not follow basic written instructions on
password requirements ) and now you have locked us both out of our own accounts.
It feels a lot like you have explained a very simple transfer pricing principle to me, me but I keep telling you that you are wrong. Over and over and
then used it against you.
Recall I did this in our home, before your very eyes for 25 years. Going back to Napster with you in my lap to download to a laptop and stick a
cassette adapter into our tape deck to play our Favs. You are fairly wealth based on my domain knowledge as well.
Might you pause for a moment, consider I know what I am talking about, and love the kids (and actually you too) enough to try and help you? Why
on gods green earth would I try to harm a head on my kids head or violate the woman I still love. I told you I dreamed about us working out last night.
I long for a better relationship with you. I don’t want to screw you (well... lol)
If you can take a moment and think about the fact that I am still begging you to please give me the feedback that any spouse deserves so I could make
you happy I’d follow it in a second . I would do anything on earth to show you I  heard you, And we would be in a better place. We get frustrated
with the overall situation and fight dirty (like we always did with each other) but I’d do anything to have a good relationship with you.
Please give me the benefit of doubt after 30
years of being madly in love with you.

I bent over backward for you all day. I helped you every way I could possibly help. I told you I need the remotes that you said were left. We agreed I
would get them. Then you lock me out of my own Xfinity account so only you have access to it. Then you proceed to play OFW games all night till I’
m done with it. I fixed your screw up with Xfinity. Happy to share details and then told you I was coming over as we agreed.
You had not checked OFW for hours and that is the only way I can reach you. When I arrive you expect me to have checked OFW like I would a text
message even though it’s hours and hours between you checking. You make working together impossible but I’m hopeful we can figure it out. Please
just afford me what you would expect me to afford you. I want to work with you. Let’s please don’t create unnecessary drama.
Thanks!

Hey- sorry, did not see this. We went from coordinating the move and fixing Xfinity in real time all day like champs. But once you dropped off it was
like a black hole.
We did discuss the remotes. In text and over the phone several times. I said the bed won’t work, and told you the TV one was white and had a green or
blue rubber cover.
If we did not discuss it why did you bring some of the things we did not discuss and put them on my car? We think alike, but that’s a stretch to think
you came up with that by yourself.
Either way. It was great working with you today. We got a ton done. And even with all the Xfinity mix ups I was able to get it fixed. Please do check to
be sure you like what I did.
I was even able to get you Diamond Status for your new account  But most importantly,
I want you to be totally clear and happy with your access and security.
Let me know if you have any questions!
Sent:01/19/2024 at 08:17 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/19/2024 at 10:42 PM)
Subject:Re: Heading Over

Message 582 of 4024
I asked you to work with me about six hours ago. I worked with Xfinity as noted, to make you as the sole owner of 1210, and made sure I moved
Diamond status to your account. So did my best to set you up for success. And asked you to confirm you were happy with the new private set up.
It is approaching midnight. You stopped communicating and I still have no working bed to sleep on and no internet access. You have changed the
password and even though I’m listed as the owner now, I can’t get in because of the password change that you made. And they need to know why I
want to reverse something you did intentionally with them.
I told you that you took over my account all afternoon. We have so many mails on it back and forth. You said you were working with fraud and it
would be 24-48 hours. I kept asking just to call me so we could tag team like we had successfully all day. I know this stuff. But you still refused.
I made sure you were totally dialed in. Set up Lugg moves on the fly. You sent junk to my place after we agreed not to do that, sent me a bed that is flat
so I can’t sleep on it, a TV you know I need the remote for and are the only with access to my WiFi. Sheesh Christine. You are actively monitoring me
now (and we know we both know how it works) and sleeping on my bed with me on a couch.
Tbh this is really messed up. Like what do I need to do to get my admin access back from you? I showed you everything today. And got you up and
runnjng after you screwed it all up not following simple directions. So you know how it all works now if you paid attention. And now you can see
everything I do, just like you were complaining about with me.
The difference is you have done this willingly, knowingly, and in opposition to my asks. When we shared access that was voluntary on both parts,
whether you knew what you were doing or not.
But now you know!
I don’t want to fight. I’ll work with you to get my physical and digital property, IP, and WiFi access back. But like the kids, I’m asking to work
together. It’s not right for you just to steal it all from me, monitor me, and unilaterally control access to my digital life after making such a huge stink
over this the last ten days. You have to see that, right?
We don’t need to have the attorneys for this. It’s common sense. Can we please work together like when I was leading the charge today and everything
you asked for got done?
Sent:01/19/2024 at 11:39 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/20/2024 at 06:27 AM)
Subject:Re: Kirkland xfinity account
Message 583 of 4024
The couch is actually pretty comfy  and I have a TV that streams fine tonight. We will get Xfinity sorted. I’ll take the lead in the AM and let you
know what I find out. It’s not a big deal. And we can get on Dr Brown’s calendar. It’s all good. We have a bunch of stuff to do before you leave next
weekend so let’s just make it happen.
We used to have a deal, for better or worse-never wake up mad. I’m proposing we fall back tomorrow to our defense mechanism. I don’t care to fight
another lick. I want to peacefully partner and stop my nonsense and you can make your decisions as well. I think we were so successful most of the
day that it made you nervous and scared and made me overconfident and hopeful.
Then the wheels came off. I am sorry for pushing blame on you and want to do better myself. I plan on doing some beach stuff tomorrow and also
buy a CL rug in Shoreline. We can work together or avoid each other. Your call. But if we cross paths at the beach I promise you a great bowl of
pezole or lemongrass chicken for lunch. Your call.

The sleep number I have no idea how to work that. I gave you the remote.

non functioning too.
I will also head to alki at some point likely in afternoon after Adrian’s game.

issue!
The TV remote is there somewhere. Just let me know if you find it. I ordered spares for you yesterday from Amazon. I’ll bring them to the game for

Have an awesome day! Wont push my luck again!

Subject:Re: Zero Progress
Message 592 of 4024
Thanks! Let's please do a quick review:
- To have and to hold from this day forward <<nope, KO interrupted that>>
- For better, for worse <<nope, you acted like it was better, then said it was worse>>
- For richer, for poorer <<nope, as soon as my settlement payout cashed, so did you>>
- In sickness and in health <<nope, not for medically certified diseases, like SUDs>>
- Forsaking all others <<nope, I have pictures of "KO" from your that prove otherwise>>
- To love and to cherish <<nope, you lied repeatedly then dumped me with no warning>>
- Until death do us part <<nope, if you are reading this and I'm typing, we are still here>>
You can mentally wrestle with this all you like to fit your narrative. You can say that fucking me 3 times a day, regular date nights, shrooming every
weekend, healthy handmade lunches on the regular, musings of time alone, house hunting for the next chapter, dreaming of our future... was just
soothing. It was not. You were all in, above and beyond. And I fucking LOVED YOU for YOU!
The reality is you really do get it. You act like you don't, but your not so stupid not to realize the difference between "soothing", which would be just
keeping it on the rails vs. doing everything you could, going above and beyond, to show me we were working, we are on the right track. The changes
made were being rewarded. You made me happier than I have ever been in my life.
The narrative you are trying to rewrite makes you feel better. You self-soothe. Yes, I was an alcoholic, I did fight mean (as we both still do) But
marriage is about honesty and transparent communication. THAT IS THE COMMITMENT. You did none of that. You said "fuck it" I'm done.
You washed your hands clean without so much as a peep that what I was doing was not right.
You ruined our marriage with your dishonesty and deception. Period. You can justify it by saying I would not have changed. But you can NEVER
SAY YOU TRIED. What you did is not what our wedding vows mean. You broke every single one of them, Christine. You owed me the truth, not
lies and deception. You were my fucking rock. My proudest moment. My queen forever.

From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/20/2024 at 10:59 PM)
Subject:Re: Zero Progress

Fucking coward

Message 595 of 4024
Is it even worth trying to get sorted? We have move, Alki, Dr Brown... and whatever else, all with hard deadlines and you going out of town next
week.
Frankly I’m tired of trying with you. I was going to suggest starting the day off right like yesterday, but that honestly went nowhere and was a huge
waste.
I don’t want to fight, and I’m tired of this bullshit OFW where you log in every 8 hours and then complain my stuff is at the house while you no show
at Alki.
The hardest part I guess is even if we make rock solid plans you just fuck it up and then complain. Then threaten me to mail my shit or move to
storage.
Friday we had four bedroom pieces to move. They only moved one, and it was busted. They acted on your direction and moved a ton of junk instead.
Then you fuck up the whole Xfinity thing before acting like we did not have remote exchange plans. Meanwhile I ordered yours before you even
asked.
I wanted to write a nice email and suggest working together. It’s just not possible with you. You won’t communicate or stand by set plans.
You are such a huge fucking time waster. I really, really hope you’re happy with your decision to blow up the Moyer’s instead of being honest, because
this sucks.
